approveMarketAndSetLowerBound(uint256).details: if market is alive and market is not during assessment, it is approved.

params._collateralIn: : amount of collateral tokens in WAD
params._min_amount_out: is min quantity of ZCB returned

isVerified(address).details: verification of trader initializes reputation score at 0, to gain reputation need to participate in markets.

setParameters((uint32,uint256,uint256,ui.details: calculates market driven s from utilization rate. If u-r high,  then s should be low, as 1) it disincentivizes  managers to approving as more proportion of the profit goes to the LP, and 2) disincentivizes the borrower  to borrow as it lowers approved principal and increases interest rate

update_redemption_price(uint256,bool,uin.details: Redemption price, as calculated (only once) at maturity, depends on total_repayed/(principal + predetermined yield) If total_repayed = 0, redemption price is 0

params.atLoss: : defines circumstances where expected returns are higher than actual
params.extra_gain: : any extra yield not factored during assessment. Is 0 yield is as expected

validatorBuy(uint256).details: get val_cap, the total amount of zcb for sale and each validators should buy  val_cap/num validators zcb  They also need to hold the corresponding vault, so they are incentivized to assess at a systemic level and avoid highly  correlated instruments  TODO change this to staking system

approveMarketAndSetLowerBound(uint256).notice: main approval function called by controller

buy(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: main entry point for longZCB buys

closeShort(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: called by user to repay shorts

getCurrentMarketPhase(uint256).notice: returns whether current market is in phase  1: onlyReputable, which also means market is in assessment 2: not onlyReputable but in asseessment  3: in assessment but canbeapproved  4: post assessment(accepted or denied)

getHedgePrice(uint256).notice: computes the price for ZCB one needs to short at to completely hedge for the case of maximal loss, function of principal and interest

getHedgeQuantity(address,uint256).notice: computes maximum amount of quantity that trader can short while being hedged such that when he loses his loss will be offset by his gains

getTraderBudget(uint256,address).notice: get trade budget = f(reputation), returns in collateral_dec sqrt for now

marketCondition(uint256).notice: returns true if amount bought is greater than the insurance threshold

newMarket(uint256,uint256,uint256,addres.notice: parameters have to be set prior

redeem(uint256).notice: trader will redeem entire balance of ZCB Needs to be called at maturity, market needs to be resolved first(from controller)

redeemDeniedMarket(uint256,bool).notice: called by traders when market is denied or resolve before maturity

redeemShortZCB(uint256).notice: called by traders when market is resolved

setParameters((uint32,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: list of parameters in this system for each market, should vary for each instrument

validatorBuy(uint256).notice: allows validators to buy at a discount  They can only buy a fixed amount of ZCB, usually a at lot larger amount
